body:
I'm not 100% sure, but I think this might cause linker problems with some compilers:

https://isocpp.org/wiki/faq/templates#templates-defn-vs-decl

Perhaps `extern template` is necessary?

https://stackoverflow.com/a/8131212/3574081
body_html:
I'm not 100% sure, but I think this might cause linker problems with some compilers:

https://isocpp.org/wiki/faq/templates#templates-defn-vs-decl

Perhaps extern template is necessary?

https://stackoverflow.com/a/8131212/3574081
